LanguageData.Ammo_4570Gov_FMJ.label: патрон 11,6х54мм
LanguageData.Ammo_4570Gov_FMJ.description: Rather large and bulky rifle cartridge traditionally loaded with blackpowder. Good for making people imitate sacks when they are hit.
